title: Emerald Bloom Bangle - Vaira Kankanam
features: This striking bangle features a central floral motif embellished with a vibrant Zambian emerald and surrounded by meticulously set diamonds. The bangle's body is adorned with a geometric pattern of diamonds, enhancing its overall brilliance. Handcrafted using traditional Hyderabadi techniques, the piece exemplifies fine artistry and attention to detail.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for formal events where a touch of refined elegance is desired.
